name: @genxapi/genxapi
description: GenxAPI — Automate, orchestrate, and publish SDKs — client api generation faster.
author: Eduardo Aparicio Cardenes

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @genxapi/template-orval && npm run build --workspace @genxapi/template-kubb && npm run build --workspace @genxapi/cli
scripts.build:template: npm run build --workspace @genxapi/template-orval && npm run build --workspace @genxapi/template-kubb
scripts.build:cli: npm run build --workspace @genxapi/template-orval && npm run build --workspace @genxapi/template-kubb && npm run build --workspace @genxapi/cli
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace @genxapi/template-orval && npm run test --workspace @genxapi/template-kubb && npm run test --workspace @genxapi/cli
scripts.typecheck: tsc -p packages/template-orval/tsconfig.json --noEmit && tsc -p packages/template-kubb/tsconfig.json --noEmit && tsc -p packages/cli/tsconfig.json --noEmit
